author: Special Correspondent
text:
Four people were killed on the spot and one person was critically injured after the SUV they were travelling by rammed a signboard near Devanahalli, on Sunday.

The deceased were identified as Suresh, Kubendra, Mahesha and Sunil.

The injured has been identified as Shankar Gowda. All five men are said to be residents of Bengaluru.

According to the police, the accident took place around 4 p.m. on Sunday while the five were returning to the city from Tirupathi.
title: Four killed as SUV rams signboard
